net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale.impl

Class DataSourceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale.impl.DataSourceAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.sql.Wrapper, javax.sql.CommonDataSource, javax.sql.DataSource

    class DataSourceAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.sql.DataSource
    Adapts a jdbc driver class to be used as a datasource.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)
